00044 namespace voom {
00045   // Split a string. Used by text parsing routines
00046   inline vector<string> splitString(string line, string delim) {
00047     char str[ line.size() + 1]; strcpy( str, line.c_str() );
00048     char* pch = strtok (str, delim.c_str());
00049     string word; vector<string> words;
00050     while (pch != NULL) {
00051       words.push_back( string(pch) );
00052       pch = strtok(NULL, delim.c_str());
00053     }
00054     return words;
00055   }
